bibl.bibl: Descent: The descent of man, and selection in relation to sex. By Charles Darwin. 2 vols. London: John Murray. 1871.
bibl.idno: 1st issue, Feb 1871: CCA.24.40–1 (Francis Darwin’s copy, inscribed by CD), and Syn.7.87.26–7 (also office paperback copies and Darwin online); 2d issue, March 1871, CCA.24.38–9, vol. 2 only; vol. 1 is 1st issue. Both vols. of 2d issue available online from Biodiversity Heritage Library. 3d issue (7th thousand), April 1871, CCA.24.42–3 (also office hardback copy). vol. 1 on Darwin Online 4th issue (December 1871) at NHM General Library SHELVES DC BD 881 and 882.; also a microform copy at Tufts which Alistair can consult. SE.
